title: Himi 646
lyrics:
M.L.
(“He ‘oku fakakonga ‘etau ‘ilo
... ka ‘i he taimi ko e te u ilo
fakalaufuli. - I Kol. 13:9,12)
1.
‘Oiau! ‘A e ngaahi faingata’a,
Hohoko he mo’ui ē!
Kau foki ai Kalisitiani -
Ko e misiteli fuapē.
Kātaki pē, Kalisitiani
‘Ai ke tu’u taula pe ho’ tui;
‘E hā mahino pē ‘amui,
‘A e ngaahi misiteli heni.
2.
Vakai ‘a e ivi kuo fufū,
‘A ‘Ela ‘ena ‘i he Lahi!
Kae nima’aki aoniu,
Ke fai ‘a ‘ene folofola:
Kātaki pē, etc.
3.
Ko e faingata’a lahi ‘ena,
‘Oku tau fa’a fēfēnāpasi,
Tau fiu ‘a fili faka’uhinga
‘Ikai ‘aupito - ‘a Mamahi,
Kātaki pē, etc.
4.
Vakai ‘a e fili lah
i
, ‘a mat
e
,
‘Ikuna ai pē ‘a e mo’ui!
Kaiha’asi hoto ‘ofa’anga
Tā holo lahi pē mo si’i!
Kātaki pē, etc.
5.
Ta’elava koā ‘a MAFIMAFI!
‘A e fili ‘ena ke tulia?
Ko e hā ‘ikai si’a tokoni?
Ko e anga ‘o e ‘OFA ia?
Kātaki pē, etc.
6.
Vakai ‘a e ‘Alo Pele! ā,
Ne tautau kovi he ‘Akau!
Kae ‘ikai si’a tokonia
Ko mate ‘ena! Fai ke alu!
Kātaki pē, etc.
7.
Ko e misiteli faingata’a
‘A e ‘ofa ni loloto fau:
‘A e hoko la ko e angahala,
Koe’uhi pe ko koe mo au,
Kātaki pē, etc.
8.
Kainga ē! ‘Oua e tāla’a,
Ka hoko mai ni misiteli:
Kuo pau ke faifai pea hā
Ko e hala faka-tāpuaki.
Kātaki pē Kalisitiani etc. *
J.E.M. Jnr.
